revisions.rev:
'''KSquirrel''' is an [[image viewer]] for the [[KDE]] [[desktop environment]] with a disk navigator, file tree, thumbnails, extended thumbnails, dynamic format support, DCOP interface, KEXIF and [[KIPI]] plugins support. The current version is 0.8.0 (Dec 07 2007). It supports [http://ksquirrel.sourceforge.net/about.php#formats more than 57 image formats], including [[Portable Network Graphics|PNG]], [[JPEG]], [[.psd|PSD]], [[APNG]]<ref>{{cite web|url=http://ksquirrel.sourceforge.net/changelog.php|title=ksquirrel Changelog Sektion: ksquirrel-0.7.2|publisher=[[SourceForge]]|accessdate=2009-05-23}}</ref>, [[GIF]], [[Windows Metafile|WMF]], [[OpenEXR]] and many other.
==See also== {{Portal|Free software}} *[[Comparison of image viewers]]
==References== <references/>
==External links== *[http://ksquirrel.sourceforge.net/ Official site]
